description:
Most entrepreneurs lack the WHO, the WHAT, and the HOW to SCALE. At Acquisition.com, we partner with companies looking to grow to $100M and beyond. We help recruit the “who”, work with our partners on the “what”, and show them the “how”. Once an entrepreneur has all three, their business scales.

WHO
Recruit talent with a winning track record to achieve new levels of growth.

WHAT
Lay out the big initiatives that will grow the company’s value the most, and ruthlessly eliminate everything else.

HOW
Help partners install our step by step proven growth strategies into each function of the business

WHAT OUR PARTNERS GET
Triple their revenue in 5 years or less
Increase their monthly cash flow
Develop a core leadership team to drive growth
Grow from “Big Small Business” into “Valuable, Sellable Enterprise”

WHO ARE WE? We are a private investment and advisory firm built by experienced entrepreneurs and world-class professionals.

WHAT ARE OUR VALUES?
Unimpeachable Character
Competitive Greatness
Sincere Candor

We hold these above all else and look for them in our partners.

Find out more at www.acquisition.com

LOOKING FOR CONTRACT RECRUITERS 👇👇👇

If you are or know someone who is a world-class recruiter, we are looking for a temporary (for now) partner to help us recruit leaders for our portfolio companies and hold-co.

Looking for those who don't just put butts in seats but have experience with skill AND culture fit for companies.

If interested, please apply here → https://lnkd.in/eZxHnbR8

Another new opportunity at Acquisition.com!!

We have several Event Coordinator opportunities on our team. This role serves as the main point of contact for our workshop guests at Acquisition.com.   

What you'll be doing? 
✅ Creating personalized WOW moments for our guests. 
✅ Event coordination, which includes vendor communication. 
✅ Event setup and preparing the space. 

What we're looking for?
🏆 Ownership and service mindset. 
🏆 Experience in events/hospitality or related degree.
🏆 Able to work weekends. 

What is the pay?
💵 $55,000 - $60,000 Salary

Location?
🏚  Our HQ in Las Vegas 

What are the benefits?
🏨 Medical, Vision, Dental Benefits
🏦 401(k) with employer match
🏖 Flexible PTO

What are the next steps?
☑ If interested, apply to the job posting below and Frank Lofaro on this post.
🚫 If NOT interested, tag someone whom this may be a "perfect" fit for.

Acquisition.com's is hiring!!

We have a Customer Experience Associate opportunity. This is a pivotal role on our team. This role is responsible for creating white-glove personalized experiences for our guests at Acquisition.com. 

What you'll be doing? 
✅ Resolve guest tickets quickly and effectively. 
✅ Create a white-glove experience for our guests. 
✅ Partner with several key departments in the company. 

What we're looking for?
🏆 Experience handling support tickets.
🏆 Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
🏆 Ability to quickly build strong customer relationships.

What is the pay?
💵 $70,000 - $80,000 Salary

Location?

We want to welcome our newest YouTube Editor Christa Loehr!!!

Christa earned a BFA in Film, Video, and Media, & channeled her skills into content creation. 

She started her career on commercial sets, then progressed to become an editor and ultimately a producer for "Diners, Drive-Ins, and Dives." 

Transitioning from traditional media, she ventured into YouTube, launching her own travel vlog and working for notable channels like MrBeast and Hopescope.

She has a passion for writing, traveling, exploring new cuisines, playing Nintendo 64 (her favorite console), and catching up on her favorite shows when possible.

Welcome to the team Christa!!

Leila Hormozi here, I wanted to drop a note to let everyone know today is Yasmin White last day as my Senior Executive Assistant... 

...BECAUSE with immense excitement and pride that I reintroduce her as our Director of Operations at Acquisition.com!!!! 

Yasmin has worked side by side me for over 6 years as an EA in many capacities and truly at this point has outgrown the role in her skills. She has stood up departments, managed teams, and managed multi million dollar projects on my and the companies behalf. 

She has made me look good to everyone and been the silent ninja of my success in soooo many ways as I like to say.

Yasmin White is a shining example of our values at Acquisition.com and i'm proud as all heck to have her step into this role. She is an example of what is possible when one has the WILL and does what it takes to get the SKILL to reach their goals. She is an inspiration to many and will continue to be.

Please give her a HUGE congratulations!!!!!
